{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15064v1", "title": "Matrix Representations of Derivations for Low-Dimensional Mock-Lie
  Algebras", "summary": "In this work, we study the matrix representation of derivations for Mock-Lie
algebras with dimensions up to four. Using matrix methods, we examine their
structure and properties, showing how these derivations help us better
understand the algebraic nature of Mock-Lie algebras.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-21T12:49:13Z"}
